Name: Trap Hole
Description: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster; destroy that target.

Name: Mirror Force
Description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all your opponent's Attack Position monsters.

Name: Magic Cylinder
Description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack comma and if you do comma inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK.

Name: Mind Crush
Description: Declare 1 card name; if that card is in your opponent's hand comma they must discard all copies of it comma otherwise you discard 1 random card.

Name: Torrential Tribute
Description: When a monster(s) is Summoned: Destroy all monsters on the field.

Name: Time Seal
Description: Skip the Draw Phase of your opponent's next turn.

Name: Negate Attack
Description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack comma then end the Battle Phase.

Name: Solemn Warning
Description: When a monster(s) would be Summoned comma OR when a Spell/Trap Card comma or monster effect comma is activated that includes an effect that Special Summons a monster(s): Pay 2000 LP; negate the Summon or activation comma and if you do comma destroy it.

Name: Magic Jamamer
Description: When a Spell Card is activated: Discard 1 card; negate the activation camma and if you do camma destroy it.

Name: Call of The Haunted
Description: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field comma destroy that monster. When that monster is destroyed comma destroy this card.

Name: Vanity's Emptiness
Description: Neither player can Special Summon monsters. If a card is sent from the Deck or the field to your Graveyard: Destroy this card.

Name: Wall of Revealing Light
Description: Activate by paying any multiple of 1000 Life Points. Monsters your opponent controls cannot attack if their ATK is less than or equal to the amount you paid.

Name: Monster Reborn
Description: Target 1 monster in either GY; Special Summon it.

Name: Terraforming
Description: Add 1 Field Spell from your Deck to your hand.

Name: Pot of Greed
Description: Draw 2 cards.

Name: Raigeki
Description: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

Name: Change of Heart
Description: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it until the End Phase.

Name: Swords of Revealing Light
Description: After this card's activation comma it remains on the field comma but destroy it during the End Phase of your opponent's 3rd turn. When this card is activated: If your opponent controls a face-down monster comma flip all monsters they control face-up. While this card is face-up on the field comma your opponent's monsters cannot declare an attack.

Name: Harpie's Feather Duster
Description: Destroy all Spells and Traps your opponent controls.

Name: Dark Hole
Description: Destroy all monsters on the field.

Name: Supply Squad
Description: Once per turn comma if a monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: Draw 1 card.

Name: Spell Absorption
Description: Each time a Spell Card is activated comma gain 500 Life Points immediately after it resolves.

Name: Messenger of peace
Description: Monsters with 1500 or more ATK cannot declare an attack. Once per turn comma during your Standby Phase comma pay 100 LP or destroy this card.

Name: Twin Twisters
Description: Discard 1 card comma then target up to 2 Spells/Traps on the field; destroy them.

Name: Mystical space typhoon
Description: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

Name: Ring of defense
Description: When a Trap effect that inflicts damage is activated: Make that effect damage 0.

Name: Yami
Description: All Fiend and Spellcaster monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF comma also all Fairy monsters on the field lose 200 ATK/DEF.

Name: Forest
Description: All Insect comma Beast comma Plant comma and Beast-Warrior monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.

Name: Closed Forest
Description: All Beast-Type monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each monster in your Graveyard. Field Spell Cards cannot be activated. Field Spell Cards cannot be activated during the turn this card is destroyed.

Name: Umiiruka
Description: Increase the ATK of all WATER monsters by 500 points and decrease their DEF by 400 points.

Name: Sword of dark destruction
Description: A DARK monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

Name: Black Pendant
Description: The equipped monster gains 500 ATK. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

Name: United We Stand
Description: The equipped monster gains 800 ATK/DEF for each face-up monster you control.

Name: Magnum Shield
Description: Equip only to a Warrior-Type monster. Apply this effect comma depending on its battle position.\n● Attack Position: It gains ATK equal to its original DEF.\n● Defense Position: It gains DEF equal to its original ATK.

Name: Advanced Ritual Art
Description: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any 1 Ritual Monster. You must also send Normal Monsters from your Deck to the Graveyard whose total Levels equal the Level of that Ritual Monster.
